name: Through my Phone #2
description:
Since when I had the chance to have a smartphone with a decent camera (I started with the Nokia 7 Plus, much love for it), I found a good compromise for when I don't have my camera with me to shoot some particular moments. The funny thing is that, with the phone, I shoot mostly landscapes, which I don't usually do with my reflex.
So I decided to mint some of it in a special edition of 10, 100 pcs each at 1 XTZ.
Every picture has its own story, its own moment, its own place. 
Please, enjoy it.
